# Harm, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]], Dread Necromancer 7

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Heroes of Horror (WotC), pg. 130

As *[[Harm (Spell)|harm]]*, except as noted above and in that this spell deals 1d12 points of damage per caster level, to a maximum of 20d12 at 20th level.
